extendedInfo.description: UberHype is a "Social Music Discovery" application for The Hype Machine Music platform. It provides a unique way to discover new and popular music being 'blogged' all around the world and stream it directly to your android devices. From indie genre to electronica, the UberHype app will help you find anything and everything that will tingle your musical taste buds. All the music here is tracked and aggregated by The Hype Machine platform whose goal is to empower independent voices that write about music. ** PRESS **Lifehackerhttp://lifehacker.com/5984978/uberhype-for-android-puts-great-new-music-on-your-phone-anywhere-you-areExclusive Review by PCMAG (Rated 4/5): http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2410919,00.aspFeatured in PCMAG's TOP Android Apps for 2012. Check the "Music and Video" section:http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2395053,00.asp Exclusive Review by TheAppTimes: http://theapptimes.com/uberhype-android-app-review/Features:- Music Discovery and On-Demand streaming- Popular Tracks - The most popular artists, searches and blogs on the internet right now.- Latest Tracks - What's going on right now in the blogosphere- Twitter Tracks - Interactive music chart of songs posted on Twitter.- Browse tracks published by Blogs - Browse tracks by Artist e.g. Kings of Leon- Media Player functionality- Last.fm Integration to Scrobble Hype Machine tracks - Browse Popular Tags or Genres of the Week- Continuous Playback mode - Read original Blog Post- Keyword Search - By Artist / Song / Blog- Create user account on Hype Machine- Browse tracks Favorited by friends on Hype Machine- Ability to Favorite tracks and listen to them anytime.- Share full tracks on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Email etc.- Subscribe or Follow an "Artist". New tracks by this artist will be automatically be added to "My Subscriptions"- Subscribe or Follow a "Blog". New tracks released on this blog will be automatically be added to "My Subscriptions" - Ability to move application to SDCard** Optional: Create FREE user account on The Hype Machine (http://hypem.com). With a free user account you can favorite searches, tracks, music blogs and other Hype Machine users by clicking on the heart icons.App Website: http://app.net/uberhypeLike us on Facebook http://facebook.com/uberhypeapp or follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/uberhypeapp to stay up to date with the latest UberHype news.In case you see issues or want to request new features please email us at uberhype@dirtywaterlabs.comDeveloped by: Dirty Water Labs (http://twitter.com/dirtywaterlabs)Press Quotes:"In short, Uberhype is a beautifully executed app, and existing Hype Machine users or not, it should get Android-using music-obsessives more than a little excited. Itâs a free download" - The Next Web"Por otro lado tenemos pestaÃ±as tambiÃ©n para populares, donde aparecerÃ¡n temas que mucha gente tiene marcados como favoritos. Si pasamos a la pestaÃ±a de recientes, encontraremos por un lado las publica .." - El Androide Libre"UberHype retains all of the social infrastructure that helped propel HypeMâs ascent to Webby Award stardom circa 2008. This includes the ability to share your âlovedâ songs across all your social" - Beantown BoogiedownTags: hype machine, blogs, zeitgeist, hype, scrape, music, streaming, on-demand, tunesPrevious version:v1.2- Shuffle your favorite songs by shaking your phone- Correctly saving listening history to hypem.com- Fixed keyboard issue on Login screen- Bug fixesv.1.0.9- Handle headphones- Handle incoming phone-callv1.0.7- Last.fm Integration to Scrobble Hype Machine tracks - Browse Popular Tags or Genres of the Weekv1.0.5- Setting to Filter out Remixesv1.0.4- Correctly updating listening history on hypem.com- All subscribed music will be added to "My Subscriptions" tab v1.0.3- Fixes for ICS or Android 4.0 - Browse & listen to weekly "ALBUM PREMIERE" - Automatically publish to Facebook and Twitter

reviews.title: Very buggy
reviews.comment: Wish I had an iphone so I could use their main app. Many songs dont play and most of the time when I push the button for the next track it will just repeat the current one. It is nice to have access to my hypem account when im out and about, but just wish it would operate without the constant hiccups.
reviews.author: Josh Wexler

reviews.title: Great with simple UI
reviews.comment: Great app with no confusing interface and a good player.
reviews.author: Aggelos Poulopoulos

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: I love this app! It\'s a gret way to find new music that\'s not your overplayed top 40 hits. The only problem is it takes a while to load sometimes.
reviews.author: becca schelhaas

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: This app is great. It\'s a super slick implementation of Hype Machine, and it\'s packed with features. The latest update makes it even better.
reviews.author: Bo Link

reviews.title: Decent app, but needs bluetooth support
reviews.comment: Good app for music, but if you like to use it with a Bluetooth headset/stereo the controls do not work on the media device.This is a big deal as I like to listen to music in my car over Bluetooth, and I don\'t want to mess with the phone to skip a song.   The app does not seem to pre-buffer the next song, so if you have a slow connection you get some silence before the next song spools up.   A lockscreen/screen on option would be great.  An exit button/shutdown option would be nice too.  If these things were fixed this would be a 4-5star app easy.
reviews.author: Steven Back

reviews.title: More improvents needed
reviews.comment: The app is quite good, and easy to use. Like to see these functions added at next update though: (i) fast-forwarding and rewinding within a track, and (ii) clear all temp files.
reviews.author: Rick Ng

reviews.title: Love hypem, but app is awful
reviews.comment: Just keeps freezing my tablet and sticks like scratched CD... When it works properly it will get 5 stars as love hypem. Uninstalled in meantime.
reviews.author: Siobhan Currie

reviews.title: My Feed?
reviews.comment: This app looks better and seems more functional than the last, but it is missing \"my feed\". This is how I discover new music. I think it is the most important part. Where is it?
reviews.author: Dustin Izatt

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Been using hype machine for years and this app isn\'t a disappointment. Works smoothly and looks great. So far no issues on my nexus 10 tablet. Just wish there was a feature to skip to later parts of the song and a horizontal view. But other than that perfect.
reviews.author: Jeffery Lee

reviews.title: The better of the two hypem apps.
reviews.comment: Update fixed all major issues, except for no horizontal view.  Well done.
reviews.author: Erik Worden

reviews.title: Hypem
reviews.comment: Coming from the hypem app on iphone, this leaves me wanting a lot more.  -store data from recently played songs, so that when I\'m away from wifi I won\'t use up all my data -when i go to my favourites, it tends to display random songs -being able to swipe to open up the main menu  -basically copy the hypem app as best you can
reviews.author: James Moffat

reviews.title: Brilliant but not perfect yet.
reviews.comment: Fantastic application for lovers on the hype machine but needs the ability to skip further ahead on a track.
reviews.author: Eric Sea

reviews.title: Flaky and unstable
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing, regularly fails to pull up music from my profile and it takes ages to start playing anything.
reviews.author: Cam Macphail

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love hypem and this app is pretty amazing. However, I miss the function where you can just shake your phone to shuffle songs. Sometimes songs don\'t play, not sure if it\'s the app problem or if it\'s the music blog.
reviews.author: Jessica Wu

reviews.title: Great app but missing some features
reviews.comment: App seems to work well when just using the app with a st of headphones, unfortunately, I never use the hype machine in this manner. The app will not stream over Bluetooth to my car stereo. The official hypem app on the iPhone performed this function flawlessly, and the google play music on android performs this function flawlessly as well, so it seems that something needs to be added to the app for this to function (maybe a2dp support). Please oh PLEASE add in this functionality, I would gladly pay for this app if it included this functionality.
reviews.author: Andrew Wiebe

reviews.title: Very annoying
reviews.comment: Overall poor app, super buggy, super glitchy, many features dont work properly or even load at all. This app needs a total overall and to be more like hype machine.
reviews.author: Zachary Garfinkel

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Ive had it for many months now...its a genre specific app which happens to suit me to a t. Theres something for everyone...dont get me wrong but it takes patience and an open-minded.  I love it.
reviews.author: Kalin Colfer

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Updated often to fix bugs. Some minor issues with playback and the app running itself multiple times. Playback issues are: some songs do not play and fail to load. Continuous playback often involves going back to the app to skip song that doesnt load or play.
reviews.author: Julian Kaczmarzyk

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars, but there are a lot of force closes when switching between songs.
reviews.author: Jason E
